Package com.bookingmx.reservation.util

Class AvailabilityChecker

java.lang.Object
com.bookingmx.reservation.util.AvailabilityChecker
public class AvailabilityChecker extends Object
Utility class for checking room availability in the reservation system. This class handles all availability-related operations including checking for date conflicts, managing room inventory, and validating capacity. All methods are static and the class cannot be instantiated. Business Rules: - Each room type has a limited inventory - SINGLE: 10 rooms available - DOUBLE: 8 rooms available - SUITE: 5 rooms available - DELUXE: 3 rooms available - Only active reservations (CONFIRMED, CHECKED_IN) count against inventory
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
BookingMx Development Team

  • Method Details

    • getRoomCapacity

      public static int getRoomCapacity(RoomType roomType)
      Gets the total capacity for a specific room type.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room
      Returns:
      the total number of rooms available for this type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if roomType is null

    • isActiveReservation

      public static boolean isActiveReservation(Reservation reservation)
      Checks if a reservation is active and should count against inventory. Only CONFIRMED and CHECKED_IN reservations are considered active.
      Parameters:
      reservation - the reservation to check
      Returns:
      true if the reservation is active, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if reservation is null

    • doReservationsOverlap

      public static boolean doReservationsOverlap(Reservation reservation1, Reservation reservation2)
      Checks if two reservations have overlapping date ranges.
      Parameters:
      reservation1 - the first reservation
      reservation2 - the second reservation
      Returns:
      true if the reservations overlap, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either reservation is null

    • getActiveReservationsForRoomType

      public static List<Reservation> getActiveReservationsForRoomType(List<Reservation> reservations, RoomType roomType)
      Filters a list of reservations to only include active ones for a specific room type.
      Parameters:
      reservations - the list of all reservations
      roomType - the room type to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of active reservations for the specified room type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if reservations list or roomType is null

    • countOverlappingReservations

      public static int countOverlappingReservations(List<Reservation> existingReservations, RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Counts how many rooms of a specific type are reserved for overlapping dates.
      Parameters:
      existingReservations - list of all existing reservations
      roomType - the type of room to check
      checkInDate - the check-in date for the new reservation
      checkOutDate - the check-out date for the new reservation
      Returns:
      the number of rooms already reserved for overlapping dates
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

    • isRoomAvailable

      public static boolean isRoomAvailable(List<Reservation> existingReservations, RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Checks if a room of the specified type is available for the given dates.
      Parameters:
      existingReservations - list of all existing reservations
      roomType - the type of room to check
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      true if at least one room is available, false if fully booked
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

    • getAvailableRoomCount

      public static int getAvailableRoomCount(List<Reservation> existingReservations, RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Gets the number of rooms still available for a specific type and date range.
      Parameters:
      existingReservations - list of all existing reservations
      roomType - the type of room to check
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      the number of rooms available (0 if fully booked)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

    • getAvailabilityReport

      public static AvailabilityChecker.AvailabilityReport getAvailabilityReport(List<Reservation> existingReservations, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Checks availability for all room types and returns a report.
      Parameters:
      existingReservations - list of all existing reservations
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      an AvailabilityReport containing availability for all room types
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

    • validateNewReservation

      public static AvailabilityChecker.ValidationResult validateNewReservation(List<Reservation> existingReservations, RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Validates that a new reservation can be created without conflicts. This method checks both date validity and room availability.
      Parameters:
      existingReservations - list of all existing reservations
      roomType - the type of room being requested
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      a ValidationResult indicating if the reservation is valid
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null
